name: Thai Bay Kanyaw
text:
Appetizers
All salad rolls are made with rice paper, carrots, cilantro, noodle, lettuce, and cucumber. Served with carrot and peanut sauce.

1. Salad Roll (2 pcs)
1. Salad Roll (2 pcs)
Salad roll served with peanut sauce. One order comes with two pieces.

$9.99
2. Spring Roll (2 pcs)
2. Spring Roll (2 pcs)
Pork Spring roll served with sweet and sour fish sauce or sweet and sour soy sauce. One order comes with two pieces.

$9.99
4. Crispy Wonton (12 pcs)
4. Crispy Wonton (12 pcs)
Pork wonton. One order comes with twelve pieces.

$8.99
5. Sweet and Sour Pork
5. Sweet and Sour Pork
$8.99
Soups
8. Special Wonton Soup
8. Special Wonton Soup
Wonton soup is made with pork wonton, soft noodles, bbq pork, shrimp, and veggies.

$18.99
6. Pho (Vietnamese Beef Noodle Soup)
6. Pho (Vietnamese Beef Noodle Soup)
Lean beef, cook beef, beef ball, cilantro, green onion, white onion, pepper, sprout, and hoisin sauce.

$19.75
7. Kwetio (Thai Beef Noodle Soup)
7. Kwetio (Thai Beef Noodle Soup)
Lean beef, cook beef, beef ball, BBQ pork, sprout, cilantro, fried onion, garlic, and peanut.

$19.99
9. Tom Yum Noodle Soup (Spicy and Sour Thai Noodle Soup)
Chicken, shrimp, mushroom, tomato, cilantro, green onion, and coconut milk.

$18.99
10. Thai Coconut Curry
Your choice of meat, broccoli, carrot, green bean, red pepper and basil. Served with rice.

$17.99
Stir Fry
11. Krapao (Thai Basil Stir Fry)
11. Krapao (Thai Basil Stir Fry)
Your choice of meat, red peppers, green bean, and basil. Served with rice and fried eggs.

$18.75
12. Chop Suey (Chinese Stir Fry)
12. Chop Suey (Chinese Stir Fry)
Your choice of meat, cabbage, carrot, and bean sprout. Served with rice.

$18.99
13. Mixed Greens
Your choice of meat, cabbage, broccoli, carrot, and onion. Served with rice.

$18.99
14. Low Mein (Chinese Stir Fry Small Soft Noodle)
14. Low Mein (Chinese Stir Fry Small Soft Noodle)
Your choice of meat, broccoli, cabbage, carrot, and onion.

$18.99
15. Pad Thai (Thai Stir Fry Flat Noodle)
15. Pad Thai (Thai Stir Fry Flat Noodle)
Your choice of meat, tofu, egg, carrot, onion, peanut, and bean sprout.

$17.99
16. Pad Woosan (Thai Stir Fry Glass Noodle)
Your choice of meat, cabbage, onion, carrot, egg, and bean sprout.

$18.99
Chow Mein
Stir fry crispy noodles. Your choice of meat, carrot, napa bean sprouts.

$18.99
Asian Favourites
17. Vietnamese Noodle Bowl
17. Vietnamese Noodle Bowl
Your choice of meat, pork spring roll, lettuce, carrot, peanuts, and cucumber. Served with sweet and sour fish sauce or sweet and sour soy sauce.

$17.99
19. Thai Noodle Salad
19. Thai Noodle Salad
Thai noodle salad made with rice noodle, bbq pork, cilantro, peanut, fried onion, fried garlic, cucumber, carrot, and lettuce.

$17.99
Special Fried Rice
21. Thai Special Fried Rice
21. Thai Special Fried Rice
Thai special fried rice is made with beef, chicken, carrot, green beans, pepper, basil garlic, and egg.

$17.99
23. Chinese Special Fried Rice
23. Chinese Special Fried Rice
Chinese special fried rice is made with chicken, BBQ pork, shrimp, onion, carrot, and bean sprouts.

$17.99
Plant Based Meals
No egg and no dairy.

E. Tofu Chops Suey
E. Tofu Chops Suey
Chinese stir fry made with tofu, onion, carrots, napa, and sprouts. Served with rice.

$19.75
A.Tofu Pad Thai
Thai sweet and sour stir fry flat rice noodles with carrot, tofu, peanut, sprouts, and onions.

$18.75
B.Tofu Pad Woonsan
Thai stir-fry glass noodles with tofu, carrot, broccoli, sprouts, and napa cabbage.

$19.99
C. Tofu Krapao
Thai basil stir-fried with tofu, green beans, red pepper, garlic, and basil.Served with rice.

$18.99
D. Tofu Mixed Green
D. Tofu Mixed Green
Stir fry tofu, onion, carrots, broccoli, and napa. Served with rice.

$19.99
F. Tofu Lowmin
Chinese stir-fried small yellow noodles with tofu, carrot, onion, broccoli, sprouts, and napa.

$19.99
G. Tofu Curry
Thai coconut soup made with tofu, broccoli, red pepper, green beans, carrots, and basil. Served with rice.

$18.99
H. Tofu Tomyum Noodle Soup
Thai spicy and sour soup made with tofu, mushrooms, tomatoes, lime, lime leaves, galanga, lemon grass, cilantro, fried onions , sprouts, and pepper.

$17.99
I. Tofu Otamin
Burmese coconut rice served with curry tofu and vegetables.

$18.99
J. Tofu Thai Noodles Salad
J. Tofu Thai Noodles Salad
Rice noodles, tofu, cilantro, peanut, cucumber, carrots, lettuce, and fried onions.

$17.99
K. Tofu Basil Fried Rice
Thai basil fried rice made with tofu, pepper, green beans and garlic.

$17.99
M. Tofu Chinese Fried Rice
Chinese-style fried rice made with tofu, carrots, sprouts, and onions.

$17.99
